t=int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n=int(input())
    [a,b,c,d]=map(int,raw_input().split())
    if a==c and b==d:
        ans=0
    elif (a+b)%2 == (c+d)%2:
        ac=max(a,c)-min(a,c)
        bd=max(b,d)-min(b,d)
        if (a+b)==(c+d) or ac==bd:
            ans=1
        else:
            ans=2
    else:
        ans=-1
    print ans
